name: runModalSavePanel(for:delegate:didSave:contextInfo:)
desc: Presents a modal Save panel to the user, then tries to save the document if the user approves the operation.
declaration:
func runModalSavePanel(for saveOperation: NSDocument.SaveOperationType, 
              delegate: Any?, 
               didSave didSaveSelector: Selector?, 
           contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
